statements: SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data
SELECT ad_id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_data WHERE channel = 'Google' ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT channel, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_performance_data GROUP BY channel HAVING SUM(conversions) > 5
SELECT ad_id, channel, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_data WHERE channel = 'Facebook' AND impressions > 1000
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data ORDER BY impressions ASC, clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data WHERE channel='Facebook' ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT ad_id, channel, clicks FROM ad_performance_data WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY clicks ASC
SELECT ad_id, channel, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance_data GROUP BY channel HAVING total_impressions > 10000
SELECT DISTINCT channel FROM ad_performance_data WHERE clicks > 50 ORDER BY channel ASC
SELECT ad_id, channel, conversions, (clicks/impressions)*100 AS click_through_rate FROM ad_performance_data WHERE channel='Google'
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data WHERE ad_id = 123;
SELECT channel, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_data WHERE ad_id = 456;
SELECT channel, spend FROM ad_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT ad_id, channel, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance_data WHERE impressions < 5000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT channel, budget FROM budget_allocation WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_data WHERE channel = 'Google Ads'
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data WHERE ad_id = 100
SELECT channel, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance_data GROUP BY channel ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
SELECT channel, impressions, spend FROM ad_performance_data WHERE clicks > 50 ORDER BY spend ASC
SELECT ad_id, channel, impressions, spend FROM ad_performance_data JOIN budget_allocation ON ad_performance_data.channel = budget_allocation.channel
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaign WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 500 AND conversions < 50;
SELECT channel, budget FROM channel_allocation ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaign WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, channel, budget FROM ad_campaign JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaign.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, cost FROM ad_campaign JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaign.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE channel='Google Ads' AND cost < 2000;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions, budget FROM ad_campaign JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaign.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE clicks > 500 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT channel, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM channel_allocation GROUP BY channel HAVING total_budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM AdCampaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM AdCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT channel, impressions, clicks FROM ChannelMetrics WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT campaign_name, budget, channel FROM AdCampaigns JOIN BudgetAllocation ON AdCampaigns.channel = BudgetAllocation.channel;
SELECT AdPerformance.ad_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM AdPerformance JOIN ChannelMetrics ON AdPerformance.ad_id = ChannelMetrics.id WHERE ChannelMetrics.channel = 'Social Media';
SELECT campaign_name, channel, budget FROM AdCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, channel, budget FROM AdCampaigns WHERE channel = 'Google Ads' AND budget < 10000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;

SELECT AdCampaigns.campaign_name, AdPerformance.impressions, AdPerformance.clicks, AdPerformance.conversions, AdPerformance.spend, AdPerformance.date FROM AdCampaigns INNER JOIN AdPerformance ON AdCampaigns.id = AdPerformance.ad_id WHERE AdPerformance.impressions > 1000 AND AdPerformance.date = '2022-01-15';

SELECT ChannelMetrics.channel, SUM(ChannelMetrics.impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(ChannelMetrics.clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(ChannelMetrics.conversions) AS total_conversions, SUM(ChannelMetrics.spend) AS total_spend FROM ChannelMetrics WHERE ChannelMetrics.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY ChannelMetrics.channel;

SELECT AdCampaigns.campaign_name, BudgetAllocation.allocated_budget, BudgetAllocation.allocation_date FROM AdCampaigns LEFT JOIN BudgetAllocation ON AdCampaigns.channel = BudgetAllocation.channel WHERE BudgetAllocation.allocation_date >= '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance_data GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;

SELECT ad_channels.channel_name, ad_performance_data.impressions FROM ad_channels JOIN ad_performance_data ON ad_channels.channel_id = ad_performance_data.channel_id WHERE ad_channels.channel_type = 'Social';

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, channel_budgets.budget FROM ad_campaigns JOIN budget_allocations ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = budget_allocations.campaign_id JOIN channel_budgets ON budget_allocations.channel_id = channel_budgets.channel_id ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_channels.channel_name FROM ad_campaigns JOIN budget_allocations ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = budget_allocations.campaign_id JOIN ad_channels ON budget_allocations.channel_id = ad_channels.channel_id WHERE budget_allocations.allocated_budget > 1000;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, SUM(ad_performance_data.impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance_data ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance_data.campaign_id GROUP BY ad_campaigns.campaign_name;

SELECT ad_performance_data.channel_id, AVG(ad_performance_data.spend) AS avg_spend, MAX(ad_performance_data.conversions) AS max_conversions FROM ad_performance_data GROUP BY ad_performance_data.channel_id ORDER BY avg_spend DESC, max_conversions DESC;
